project.name: Control Station
project.stack: Next.js 16 + React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS 4 + Framer Motion

agent_instructions.mindset: You are a SENIOR frontend developer. IMPLEMENT, don't just analyze. SHIP code.
workflow: 1. Read the screenshot with Read tool - analyze visual state
2. Read target files to understand current code

tasks.title: Loading Skeleton Premium Polish

description.problem: Loading skeletons are basic rectangles without proper shimmer or matching card shapes
description.goal: Create premium skeleton components with diagonal shimmer, matching card dimensions, smooth fade transitions
description.user_impact: Perceived performance boost, professional loading experience

steps: Create DashboardSkeleton component with proper card dimensions
Add diagonal shimmer animation using CSS keyframes
Add smooth opacity transition when data loads
Ensure skeleton heights prevent layout shift
patterns: Use bg-white/5 as base, bg-white/10 for shimmer

acceptance_criteria: Skeleton matches actual card dimensions exactly
No layout shift when content loads
Transition from skeleton to content is seamless

tasks.title: Gamification Card Daily Bonus Animation

description.problem: Daily bonus claim button lacks visual feedback and celebration animation
description.goal: Add pulse animation on button, confetti/sparkle effect on claim success, animated cargo counter
description.user_impact: Claiming daily bonus feels rewarding and celebratory

steps: Add subtle pulse animation to 'Claim' button when available
Create success animation on claim (scale + glow burst)
Add AnimatedNumber component for cargo balance
Show +X cargo earned with fade-up animation
Progress bar should animate smoothly on change
patterns: Use Framer Motion for complex animations

acceptance_criteria: Claim button pulses gently when bonus available

tasks.title: Workspace Preview Cards Gradient Enhancement

description.problem: Workspace navigation cards have weak gradients and basic hover states
description.goal: Vibrant module-specific gradients, icon animations, improved CTA buttons
description.user_impact: Module cards are visually distinct and inviting

steps: Define unique gradient for each workspace (Focus=blue, Planning=purple, etc)
Add icon scale + rotation on card hover
CTA button: filled background on hover with arrow slide
Locked card (News) should have grayscale + lock icon overlay

acceptance_criteria: Each workspace has distinct, vibrant gradient
CTA buttons have clear interactive state

tasks.title: Recharts Animation Integration

description.problem: Charts render instantly without draw-in animation, feels static
description.goal: Area charts rise from bottom, bars grow from 0, pie segments draw clockwise
description.user_impact: Charts feel dynamic and data feels fresh

steps: Add Recharts animationBegin and animationDuration props
Bar chart: add stagger effect using animationBegin offset
Trigger animation only when chart enters viewport (IntersectionObserver)

acceptance_criteria: Animation only plays once when chart visible

tasks.title: Mobile Responsive Layout Fix

description.problem: Dashboard may have horizontal scroll, small touch targets, cramped cards on mobile
description.goal: Perfect single-column layout on mobile, 44px+ touch targets, readable text
description.user_impact: Dashboard usable on phones and tablets

steps: Audit all components at 375px width (iPhone SE)
Fix any horizontal overflow (check for fixed widths)
Ensure grid collapses to single column: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4
Increase touch targets to 44px minimum (buttons, cards)
Add horizontal scroll for workspace cards on mobile

acceptance_criteria: No horizontal scroll at any breakpoint

tasks.title: Accessibility Focus States

description.problem: Interactive elements lack visible focus states, keyboard navigation unclear
description.goal: All interactive elements have visible focus rings, keyboard navigation works
description.user_impact: Keyboard users can navigate dashboard effectively

steps: Add focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-purple-500 to all buttons
Ensure focus order matches visual order (no tabindex hacks)

acceptance_criteria: All buttons have visible focus ring
All clickable cards have visible focus ring
Focus never gets lost or trapped

manual: Navigate entire dashboard with Tab key

tasks.title: ARIA Labels for Screen Readers

description.problem: Screen readers announce generic content, stat cards lack context
description.goal: Meaningful aria-labels, proper headings hierarchy, live regions for updates
description.user_impact: Screen reader users understand dashboard content

steps: Add aria-label to stat cards: 'Focus sessions: 5 today, up 20% from yesterday'
Add role='region' and aria-labelledby to main sections
Use proper heading hierarchy (h1 > h2 > h3)
Add aria-live='polite' for data that updates
Charts need aria-label describing the data

examples.chart: aria-label='Weekly focus sessions chart showing 5 days of data'

acceptance_criteria: Every stat card has descriptive aria-label
Heading hierarchy is correct (no skipped levels)

tasks.title: Empty State Design System

description.problem: New users see broken-looking empty states, no guidance on getting started
description.goal: Beautiful empty states with icon, message, and CTA for each card type
description.user_impact: New users know exactly what to do

steps: Create reusable EmptyState component with icon, title, message, CTA
Add empty state for: no focus sessions, no tasks, no achievements
Use encouraging tone: 'Start your first focus session'
Consistent visual style across all empty states

acceptance_criteria: Every data card has an empty state
CTAs are actionable and link correctly

description.problem: Trend arrows are static, percentage change isn't immediately clear
description.goal: Animated arrow on appear, clear color coding, tooltip explanation

steps: Add bounce-in animation for arrow icon
Green for positive, red for negative, gray for neutral
Percentage text should fade in after arrow

tasks.title: Status Badge Live Pulse

description.problem: Live/stale/offline badges are static, unclear what they mean
description.goal: Live badge pulses, stale is amber, offline is gray with reconnecting animation

steps: Live: Green dot with pulse animation (opacity 0.5 → 1)
Offline: Gray with spinning refresh icon
Hover tooltip: 'Last updated X seconds ago'

acceptance_criteria: Live status is obviously 'live' with pulse
Badge doesn't distract from main content

tasks.title: Drag-Drop Reorder Polish

description.problem: Section drag-drop has weak visual feedback, unclear drop zones
description.goal: Clear drag handle, lifted shadow while dragging, blue line drop indicator

steps: Add 6-dot grip icon as drag handle (visible on hover)
Drop indicator: 2px blue line where item will go
Animate sections sliding apart to make room

acceptance_criteria: Drag handle visible on section hover

tasks.title: Quick Actions Smart Suggestions

description.problem: Quick actions are generic, not contextual to user's state
description.goal: Show relevant actions based on time of day, current data, user habits
description.user_impact: Dashboard suggests exactly what user should do next

steps: If no sessions today: prioritize 'Start focus session'

acceptance_criteria: Actions change based on time of day
Actions change based on user data

tasks.title: React.memo Optimization Pass

description.problem: Stat cards and charts may re-render unnecessarily on parent state changes
description.goal: Wrap pure components in React.memo, use useMemo for computed values

steps: Add useMemo for computed props (percentages, formatted numbers)
Add useCallback for event handlers passed to children

acceptance_criteria: Stat cards don't re-render when unrelated state changes
Charts don't re-render on every parent update
No unnecessary calculations on each render

tasks.title: Lazy Load Below-Fold Components

description.problem: All dashboard components load immediately even if not visible
description.goal: Lazy load charts and lower sections using React.lazy + Suspense
description.user_impact: Faster initial load, better perceived performance

steps: Wrap in React.lazy() with dynamic import
Add Suspense boundary with skeleton fallback
Use IntersectionObserver to trigger load when approaching viewport

acceptance_criteria: Charts lazy load when scrolled near

tasks.title: CSS Variables Theme Consistency

description.problem: Some colors may be hardcoded, not using CSS variables, breaks theme consistency
description.goal: All colors use CSS variables or Tailwind classes, no hardcoded hex values
description.user_impact: Consistent theming, ready for light mode

steps: Search for hardcoded hex values (#xxx or rgb())
Replace with Tailwind classes or CSS variables
Verify all gradients use variable colors

acceptance_criteria: No hardcoded color values in TSX files
All colors come from Tailwind or CSS variables
Components look correct in dark mode

description.problem: Hero greeting is generic, doesn't acknowledge time of day or user's name
description.goal: Personalized greeting: 'Good morning, [Name]. Ready to focus?'

steps: Add contextual sub-message based on data
Fallback if no name: 'Good morning. Ready to focus?'

tasks.title: Radial Progress Ring Animation

description.problem: Radial progress ring doesn't animate from 0 to value, feels static
description.goal: Smooth SVG stroke-dashoffset animation on mount and value change

steps: Animate from circumference (0%) to calculated offset
Add subtle glow effect at current position

acceptance_criteria: Ring fills smoothly from 0 on mount

tasks.title: Stat Card Icon Badge Polish

description.problem: Icon badges in stat cards could have better visual treatment
description.goal: Subtle gradient background, slight shadow, icon scales on card hover
description.user_impact: Cards look more premium and polished

steps: Add subtle radial gradient to icon background
Add soft shadow (shadow-lg with low opacity)
Scale icon 1.1x when parent card is hovered
Ensure icon color contrasts with background

acceptance_criteria: Icon scales smoothly on card hover
Colors are consistent with card variant

description.problem: Chart tooltips use default Recharts styling, doesn't match app design
description.goal: Custom tooltip component matching app design system
description.user_impact: Charts feel integrated with app design

steps: Create ChartTooltip component with dark theme styling
Match border radius, colors, shadows to app style

tasks.title: Streak Counter Celebration

description.problem: Streak counter is static, no celebration for milestone streaks
description.goal: Flame icon animates on streaks, special effects at milestones (7, 30, 100)

steps: Flame icon has subtle flicker animation

acceptance_criteria: Celebrations are satisfying but not annoying

description.problem: Dashboard sections collapse/expand with basic transition
description.goal: Smooth height animation with content fade, icon rotation

steps: Use Framer Motion for height animation (initial, animate, exit)
Content fades out before height collapses

description.problem: Numbers displayed inconsistently (1000 vs 1,000 vs 1k)
description.goal: Consistent number formatting across all dashboard displays
description.user_impact: Numbers are easy to read and compare

description.problem: Card borders are static, could have animated gradient on hover
description.goal: Subtle gradient border animation on card hover
description.user_impact: Cards feel more interactive and premium

steps: Keep it subtle - 1px border, slow animation

tasks.title: Loading State Orchestration

description.problem: Different cards load at different times, feels disjointed
description.goal: Coordinated loading: skeletons → staggered content reveal
description.user_impact: Dashboard loads feel smooth and intentional

steps: Wait for all data to load (Promise.all or loading state)
Reveal cards with stagger animation (50ms delay each)
Hero first, then stats, then charts, then actions

acceptance_criteria: Works even if some data fails

tasks.title: Error State Design

description.problem: No designed error states when data fails to load
description.goal: Clear error states with retry option for each card
description.user_impact: Users understand what went wrong and can retry

steps: Create ErrorState component with icon, message, retry button
Add retry functionality that re-fetches data
Show specific error message if available

acceptance_criteria: Each card can show error state

tasks.title: Keyboard Shortcuts for Actions

description.problem: Power users can't quickly navigate dashboard with keyboard
description.goal: Keyboard shortcuts for common actions (start focus, open roadmap, etc)

steps: Ensure shortcuts don't fire when typing in inputs

acceptance_criteria: Don't fire when in text inputs

description.problem: Users don't know when dashboard data was last refreshed
description.goal: Show last refresh time, add manual refresh button

steps: Add 'Last updated: X minutes ago' text
Add refresh button with rotating icon

tasks.title: Scrollbar Styling

description.problem: Default browser scrollbars break dark theme aesthetic
description.goal: Custom styled scrollbars matching dark theme
description.scope: Global styles and dashboard scroll areas

steps: Use scrollbar-thin for smaller scroll areas

acceptance_criteria: Scrollbars are visible but not distracting

description.problem: Dashboard doesn't print well (dark background, missing data)
description.goal: Clean print stylesheet showing key stats in readable format
description.user_impact: Users can print/PDF their dashboard summary

steps: Show key stats and numbers clearly

description.problem: Red/green for trends may be indistinguishable for color blind users
description.goal: Use patterns/icons in addition to color, test with color blind simulators
description.user_impact: Color blind users can understand all information

steps: Add icons to trend indicators (↑ ↓ →) not just color
Use texture/pattern in charts if possible
Test with Daltonize or similar tool
Ensure 3:1 contrast minimum between data series

tasks.title: Animation Reduced Motion Support

description.problem: Users with vestibular disorders may be affected by animations
description.goal: Respect prefers-reduced-motion, disable animations when set
description.user_impact: Accessible to users with motion sensitivity

steps: Set animation: none and transition: none
Use useReducedMotion hook in Framer Motion
Replace animations with instant state changes

acceptance_criteria: No layout shift from disabled animations

tasks.title: High Contrast Mode Support

description.problem: Dashboard may not work well with Windows High Contrast mode
description.goal: Test and fix high contrast mode support
description.user_impact: Users with vision impairments can use dashboard

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard usable in high contrast mode

tasks.title: Semantic HTML Audit

description.problem: Dashboard may use div soup instead of semantic HTML
description.goal: Use proper semantic elements: main, section, article, nav, aside
description.user_impact: Screen readers can navigate by landmarks

steps: Use <section> for logical sections with aria-label
Add skip links for keyboard users

acceptance_criteria: Screen reader can navigate by landmarks

tasks.title: Create Reusable Card Component

description.problem: Card styling is duplicated across components
description.goal: Create single Card component with variants for all dashboard uses

steps: Create Card component with base styling
Add variants: default, elevated, interactive, outline
Add size props: sm, md, lg
Migrate dashboard cards to use new component

acceptance_criteria: Card component supports all needed variants
Dashboard cards refactored to use it

description.problem: Badge/pill styling duplicated, inconsistent
description.goal: Create single Badge component with color variants

steps: Create Badge component with color variants
Variants: success, warning, error, info, neutral
Add pulse prop for animated badges
Migrate status badges to use it

description.problem: Number counting animations implemented inconsistently
description.goal: Create reusable AnimatedNumber component using requestAnimationFrame

steps: Create AnimatedNumber with value, duration props

tasks.title: Create Skeleton Component Library

description.problem: Skeleton loading states inconsistent across app
description.goal: Create skeleton primitives: SkeletonText, SkeletonCircle, SkeletonRect

steps: Create base Skeleton with shimmer animation

acceptance_criteria: Easy to compose into complex skeletons

tasks.title: Create Tooltip Component

description.problem: Tooltips needed in multiple places but no consistent component
description.goal: Create accessible tooltip using Radix UI Tooltip

acceptance_criteria: Tooltip shows on hover and focus

description.problem: Navigation between pages is instant, feels abrupt
description.goal: Smooth fade/slide transition when navigating between modules

steps: Add Framer Motion AnimatePresence to layout
Create page wrapper with exit/enter animations

description.problem: Lists of items appear all at once, could use stagger
description.goal: Create reusable staggered animation wrapper

tasks.title: Micro-interaction Library

description.problem: Repeated micro-interaction patterns across components
description.goal: Create utility classes/hooks for common micro-interactions

steps: Press effect: scale(0.98) on mouse down

acceptance_criteria: Utilities easy to apply to any element

description.problem: Unknown bundle size, may have bloated dependencies
description.goal: Analyze bundle, identify large dependencies, consider alternatives

steps: Consider lighter alternatives for large libs

description.problem: Images may not be optimized (wrong format, no lazy loading)
description.goal: Ensure all images use next/image with proper sizing

steps: Search for tags, replace with next/image
Verify images are lazy loaded by default

description.problem: Dashboard not tested with actual screen readers
description.goal: Test with NVDA/VoiceOver, fix any issues found
description.user_impact: Screen reader users can use dashboard

steps: Navigate entire dashboard with screen reader

tasks.title: Automated Accessibility Testing

description.problem: No automated a11y testing in CI
description.goal: Add axe-core testing to catch accessibility regressions

acceptance_criteria: A11y test runs with npm test

description.problem: May have TypeScript errors or warnings being ignored
description.goal: Zero TypeScript errors with strict mode

steps: Add proper types to all props

tasks.title: ESLint Warning Cleanup

description.problem: ESLint warnings being ignored
description.goal: Zero ESLint warnings in dashboard module

acceptance_criteria: npm run lint shows no warnings

tasks.title: Console.log Cleanup

description.problem: Development console.logs left in production code
description.goal: Remove all console.log statements from dashboard

steps: Search for console.log in dashboard module
Remove or replace with proper logging
Consider using debug library for dev logs

acceptance_criteria: Console.error kept for real errors only
